titlealts.searchtitle: Data Set: CDS V6-2 Type 010 - Accident and Emergency CDS - Specification

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 001 - CDS Interchange Header

entry.p: Function: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2 Type 001 - Commissioning Data Set Interchange HeaderOne per Interchange submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 003 - CDS Message Header

entry.p: Function: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2 Type 003 - Commissioning Data Set Message HeaderOne per Commissioning Data Set Message submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange

body.p: One of the following options must be used:

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 005N - CDS Transaction Header Group - Net Change Protocol

entry.p: Function: To carry Commissioning Data Set identification and addressing data and other data indicating the specific use of the Net Change Update Mechanism of the Commissioning Data Set Submission Protocol.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2 Type 005N - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Net Change ProtocolOne per Commissioning Data Set record submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 005B - CDS Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update Protocol

entry.p: Function: To carry Commissioning Data Set identification and addressing data and other data indicating the specific use of the Bulk Replacement Update Mechanism of the Commissioning Data Set Submission Protocol.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2 Type 005B - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update ProtocolOne per Commissioning Data Set record submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.
To carry the details of the Patient Pathway.
DATA GROUP: REFERRAL TO TREATMENT PERIOD CHARACTERISTICS
To carry the Identity of the Patient.See Note: S3 in Commissioning Data Set Business Rules.
DATA GROUP: UNVERIFIED IDENTITY STRUCTUREMust be used for all other values of the NHS_NUMBER_STATUS_INDICATOR_CODENOT included in the above
DATA GROUP: WITHHELD IDENTITY STRUCTUREMust be used where the Commissioning Data Set record has been anonymised
DATA GROUP: VERIFIED IDENTITY STRUCTUREMust be used where the NHS_NUMBER_STATUS_INDICATOR_CODENational Code = 01 (Number present and verified)
DATA GROUP: PATIENT CHARACTERISTICS (A AND E)
To carry the characteristics of the Patient for an Accident and Emergency Attendance.
To carry the Patient's General Medical Practitioner and the General Practice details.
To carry the details of the Accident and Emergency Attendance location.
DATA GROUP: ATTENDANCE OCCURRENCE - ACTIVITY CHARACTERISTICS
To carry the characteristics of the Accident and Emergency Attendance.
To carry the details of the Service Agreement.
DATA GROUP: ATTENDANCE OCCURRENCE - PERSON GROUP (A AND E CONSULTANT)
To carry the details of the Responsible Clinician.
To carry the details of the ICD coded Clinical Diagnoses.
To carry the details of the READ coded Clinical Diagnoses.
DATA GROUP: CLINICAL DIAGNOSIS GROUP (A AND E)
To carry the details of the Accident and Emergency coded Clinical Diagnoses.
DATA GROUP: ATTENDANCE OCCURRENCE - CLINICAL INVESTIGATION GROUP (A AND E)
To carry the details of the Accident and Emergency coded Investigations undertaken.
DATA GROUP: ATTENDANCE OCCURRENCE - CLINICAL ACTIVITY GROUP (OPCS)
To carry the details of the OPCS coded Clinical Activities and Treatments undertaken.
DATA GROUP: MAIN OPERATING HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONAL
DATA GROUP: MAIN OPERATING HEALTHCARE PROFESSIONAL 2
DATA GROUP: ATTENDANCE OCCURRENCE - CLINICAL ACTIVITY GROUP (READ)
To carry the details of the READ coded Clinical Activities and Treatments undertaken.
DATA GROUP: ATTENDANCE OCCURRENCE - CLINICAL TREATMENT GROUP (A AND E)
To carry the details of the Accident and Emergency coded Clinical Activities and Treatments undertaken.

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 004 - CDS Message Trailer

entry.p: Function: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2 Type 004 - Commissioning Data Set Message TrailerOne per Commissioning Data Set Message submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service. Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange

p.xref: CDS V6-2 Type 002 - CDS Interchange Trailer

entry.p: Function: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission.

DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2 Type 002 - Commissioning Data Set Interchange TrailerOne per Interchange submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service.Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange
